meanings.definition: A person belonging to a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The club has many members who meet every week.
meanings.sent2: The team members worked together to win the game.
meanings.sent3: The members of the book club always get lost in their novels.
meanings.sent4: The members of the orchestra harmonized beautifully during the concert.
meanings.sent5: The members of the jury carefully considered all the evidence before reaching a verdict.

meanings.definition: A part of a whole, especially a body part.
meanings.sent1: Each of the body's members plays a vital role in its function.
meanings.sent2: The fingers are important members of the hand.
meanings.sent3: The leg muscles are hardworking members that support movement.
meanings.sent4: The heart is a crucial member of the circulatory system.
meanings.sent5: The brain, as the main member of the nervous system, controls all bodily functions.
